actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1,4-Benzenedicarboxylic acid, polymer with N,N'Bis(2-aminoethyl)-1,2-ethanediamine, cyclized, methosulfate.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1,4-Benzenedicarboxylic acid, polymer with N,N'Bis(2-aminoethyl)-1,2-ethanediamine, cyclized, methosulfate.

titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1,4-Benzenedicarboxylic acid, polymer with N,N'Bis(2-aminoethyl)-1,2-ethanediamine, cyclized, methosulfate.
